|type         = Genshin Impact
|type2        = Videos

'''Character Demos''' are videos released by official ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' media that showcase [[Playable Characters|playable characters]]' model and animation designs and skills.

The Character Demos for 5-star characters usually feature special animated scenes while those for 4-star characters only show their in-game movesets. Qiqi, Mona, and Keqing are the only 5-star characters with no animated scenes.
